topic.title: Tables
topic.shortdesc: Documentation and examples for styling DITA tables with Bootstrap classes.

section.title: Search
section.p: Due to the widespread use of table elements across third-party widgets like calendars and date pickers, Bootstrap’s tables are opt-in. Extend with optional modifier outputclasses or custom styles. All table styles are not inherited in Bootstrap, meaning any nested tables can be styled independent from the parent.
Using the most basic table markup, here’s how the default DITA Bootstrap .table-based tables look in Bootstrap
